title: WebVPython WASM Runner
desc: A WebVPython runner using Pyodide and WASM to serve interactive Python in the browser. Focused on iframe messaging, dynamic imports, and validation.

title: Bluetooth Attendance Application
desc: Python-based tool for automated attendance tracking via Bluetooth MAC detection with export features.

title: Budget Manager
desc: Rust CLI tool for managing expenses and income with structured data and efficient parsing.

title: Obesity Risk Prediction
desc: Applied ML models to predict obesity categories based on lifestyle features. Includes data preprocessing and visualization.

title: Password Manager Testing
desc: Automated testing suite with Selenium for a collaborative password manager project.

title: Spring Boot Showcase
desc: REST API learning project using Spring Boot, focusing on endpoints and minimal configuration.

title: Portfolio Website
desc: This website. Built from scratch with responsive design, dynamic data loading, and dark/light theming.
